Text:
Not workin with HTC Universal. (640x480) There is two small screens showing the game. Its not using full screen.

Damn.. Maybe the best game ever.

Anyone ideas? How to change resolution maybe?

I am obsessed with this game and always have been... If you are like me then please check out the tribute animation I created on newgrounds you will love it:
